title: HiyaHiya Circular 32 inch (81cm) Sharp Steel Knitting Needle Size US 3 (3.25mm) HISSTCIR32-3
description: HiyaHiya Sharp Steel Circular Needles have a slick but not too slick, smooth finish, flexible cables and near perfect joins with sharp tips that are great for increasing, decreasing and intricate stitch patterns. They are lightweight to handle and will warm quickly to the hand.
